title: please some one pro help me
body:
i have deleted league of legneds and i cant download it again ( very big )  so can anyone give it for me as zip file ( upload it and give me a link )
please guys :(
i will gift free 520 skin for anyone from eune 
please 
thx

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'd be better off asking someone to do this on the EUNE boards, however your reasoning makes no sense.

Even if someone were to archive a patched up install of league you'd still have to download the file which would be just as big as the game install. It's better for you to download via the patcher.
